name: Selatria: Advent of the Dakk'rian Empire
description: Selatria follows the story of main characters Mage and Melanie, whose home of Availia is threatened by an invading imperial army. These two soon find themselves on the run, recruiting friends in unlikely places to protect their homeâ€¦ and eventually the world.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP/Windows Vista/Windows 7/8/10 Processor: PC with at least a Dual-Core or higher processor Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 9.0 Compatible DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 4 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX 9.0 Compatible Sound
